name.description: Specifies the name of the Credential. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group in which the Credential is created. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

automation_account_name.description: The name of the automation account in which the Credential is created. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

username.description: The username associated with this Automation Credential.

password.description: The password associated with this Automation Credential.

description.description: The description associated with this Automation Credential.

id.description: The ID of the Automation Credential.

create.description: Used when creating the Automation Credential.

update.description: Used when updating the Automation Credential.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Automation Credential.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Automation Credential.
